Title: Protects certain employees from a reduction of wages due to their involvement in the investigation of a violation of a workplace violence protection program
Summary: Protects certain employees from a reduction of wages due to their involvement in the investigation of a violation of a workplace violence protection program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to protecting certain employees from a reduction of wages due to their involvement in the investigation of a violation of a workplace violence protection program
